mapper.select: select Withdrawal_rate_2g,Withdrawal_rate_4g,complete_Timely_rate,form_Compliance_rate,one_Passing_rate,Utilization_rate,Attendance_rate,Upper_station_rate,Frontline_rate from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY where FGS=#{name} and TIME like to_date(#{time},'yyyy-mm-dd')
select * from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY where FGS=#{name} and TIME like to_date(#{time},'yyyy-mm-dd')
select * from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY_T where FGS=#{name} and TIME like to_date(#{time},'yyyy-mm-dd')
select ${name},time TIME from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY where fgs = #{city} and time between to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') order by time
select ${name},FGS from PM_GFS_INDICATE_DAY where time like to_date(#{time},'yyyy-mm-dd')
select ${column_name} from ${table_name} where FGS =#{city} and TIME like to_date(#{time},'yyyy-mm-dd')
